batch1_core_form.name: Clean Geometric
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, minimal geometric lettermark, uppercase S with flat truncated ends, three horizontal staircase lines fanning outward from each terminal of the S, steps ascend at top-right and descend at bottom-left, single continuous stroke weight, deep teal color on dark navy background, vector style, modern health technology brand, clean Swiss design

batch1_core_form.name: Bold Weight
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, bold thick lettermark, uppercase S with squared-off flat terminals, three stepped horizontal lines at each end forming a staircase pattern, heavy stroke weight, solid geometric forms, deep teal #008F86 on black, contemporary medical technology logo, minimal and confident

batch1_core_form.name: Thin Elegant
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, thin elegant monoline lettermark, uppercase S with flat ends and three fine horizontal staircase lines extending from each terminal, hairline weight, refined and precise, teal line art on dark background, luxury health brand mark, high-end minimal

batch1_core_form.name: Rounded Soft
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, rounded friendly lettermark, uppercase S with softly truncated ends, three rounded horizontal steps fanning from each end, slightly rounded stroke caps, approachable but professional, teal on dark navy, wellness technology brand, warm geometric

batch1_core_form.name: Sharp Angular
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, sharp angular lettermark, uppercase S with crisp flat terminals, three precise horizontal staircase lines at each end with exact 45-degree stagger, technical and precise, teal on black, medical device aesthetic, engineered precision

batch1_core_form.name: Wide S
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, wide proportioned S lettermark with flat terminals, horizontal staircase steps extending from each end, wider than tall aspect ratio, expansive and open feeling, deep teal, dark background, breathing room in the design, audio technology brand

batch1_core_form.name: Tall Narrow S
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, tall narrow S lettermark with flat terminals and staircase steps at each end, condensed vertical proportion, three horizontal lines fanning from top and bottom, elegant and upright, teal on dark, premium health app logo

batch1_core_form.name: Asymmetric Weight
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, S lettermark where stroke weight transitions from thin at the top staircase to thick at the bottom staircase, suggesting progression and growth, flat terminals with three stepped lines at each end, teal gradient from light to dark, on dark background

batch1_core_form.name: Disconnected Steps
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, minimal S lettermark with flat ends, three short horizontal lines floating near each terminal with slight gaps between steps and S body, disconnected staircase effect, negative space between elements, teal on dark navy, modern tech logo

batch1_core_form.name: Connected Steps
batch1_core_form.prompt: Logo design, S lettermark where the staircase steps are connected by thin vertical lines creating actual stair shapes, flat-ended S with integrated step structures at top and bottom, architectural feeling, deep teal on black, structured and purposeful

batch4_stylistic_range.name: Ultra Minimal

batch4_stylistic_range.name: Techno Digital

batch4_stylistic_range.name: Negative Space

batch4_stylistic_range.name: Double Line

batch4_stylistic_range.name: Filled Geometric

batch4_stylistic_range.name: Abstract Minimal
